body:
thomas the train and ronald McDonald?
god this so hilarious and disgusting at the same time
Thomas the train on page 12, wtf?
:( this is a no for me

Am I the only one who noticed the Madoka Magica references? Like on page 12, isn't that a chibi Kyouko mixed in, to the right of Ronald McDonald and just above Thomas the Train Engine? And I'm pretty sure the girl in the bottom-right corner of the top panel is Madoka herself, with Kyouko appearing as well, in nothing but slip-on shoes. Then on page 3, when they all start freaking out, isn't that Homura there just over and between Louise and Kirche's shoulders? Close inspection shows that her clothes seem different from the uniform worn by the other students, too, or so it seems, at least... I guess I could be wrong, though... I mean, unless you could see Kyuubei watching from the sidelines as always, it couldn't possibly... Wait. DX Yeah, I'm pretty sure I'm right about this...
Wtf is Ronald Mcdonald doing here!?
Did anyone else notice the dick
